related_post.text: Hi I am new to golang and trying to understand modules. I have a module that I implemented locally and want to use it from a different module locally. I am not planning to push to github or any other server. Does anyone know the best way to do this ?

so_post.text: @matoxian See here https://stackoverflow.com/a/52330233You can use replace in go.mod file to import module localy

comments: Marcelli has question and Yennefer has answer with SO post
